I'm trying to corrupt Thanatos.

"@Thanotos Omega":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/556283406368722220450500#post_556283406368722220450500
Pros of fetish fandoms:
Less people that e-beg for patreon donations that ragequit if people don't donate cause the majority of them are in it cause they genuinely want to draw whereas regular fandoms a lot of them are trying to get e-popular so that they can get rich.  To them it's a hobby drawing.

Considerably less people insulting other people's costumes for not being accurate enough.

Considerably less people yelling and screaming at each other over headcanons.

Considerably less people political/ideological/religious arguments cause people are there for their hobby.

No one ever tries to take over a fetish fandom to make it a front for a political affiliation or religious affiliation.  An example of what I mean by this is that when pokemon first came out religious groups tried to make a christian card game to cash out on pokemon's popularity and trying to use pokemon like card games for religious profit.

Less people trying to upvote whore cause the majority of the artists are there cause it's a hobby.

Less costumers e-begging for money cause the majority of them it's a hobby and they're not trying to create a living off making cosplay costumes but rather cause they like to cosplay.

*WAAAAAAAYY* less people trying to start fights over sexual orientation; as in considerably less people that try to push gays out of fandoms cause glbt are considerably more accepted than most fandoms.


Tl:dr; look at deviantart comments on artwork vs say a porn site's comments on artwork.  Deviantart has constant fucking drama and people yelling at each other.

topics.body:
+*So I just made a very bold, but promising deal with my dad just now:*+

_Since I brought up EHAN and I's plans to improve our channel and video making, I brought up the idea of getting our hands on Sony Vegas Pro 13._

_And he said he'd strongly consider it, if we help him out with a yard project over at my aunt's place on Tuesday. Good thing is my aunt has a small backyard, so it won't be too labor extensive._ 

We agreed and shook on it. Now EHAN and I are going to get down and dirty on Tuesday, and if all goes well, he'll help us get our hands on Sony Vegas Pro 13. Then hopefully our video production and/or quality will start to go up. I have strong confidence in my actions right now.

Hopefully everything works out. 
It might, all things considered, since our dad is pretty awesome and highly supportive of us.
